type.name: WindowOptions
type.prop: The content to display inside of the window.
The foreground color of the container group which will hold the content.
Do not stretch the SVG when embedded as an image. This is achieved by explicitly setting width and height attributes on the `svg` element.
An optional title for the window.
Any additional attributes to set on the holder of the content, e.g., `font-family`.
The minimum width that the window should take. If the content's width is greater than this value, the height will adjust to the content.
The minimum height that the window should take. If the content's height is greater than this value, the height will adjust to the content.
The padding on the Y-axis (top and bottom).
The padding on the X-axis (left and right).
Remove whitespace between tags (e.g., between `>` and `<`). If there are any problems with generated SVG, this could be disabled.
